description: A powerful VS Code extension for enhancing C/C++ development with clangd.
command.newSourcePair.title: New C/C++ Header/Source Pair
command.switchHeaderSource.title: Switch Between Header/Source
command.configureRules.title: Configure C++ File Extension Rules
command.configureHeaderGuard.title: Configure Header Guard Style
command.openClangFormatEditor.title: Open Clang-Format Visual Editor
command.qt.newProject.title: Clotho: New Qt CMake Project
command.clangFormat.validate.title: Clotho: Validate Clang-Format Config
command.clangFormat.rollbackLastSaved.ti: Clotho: Rollback to Last Saved Config
command.clangFormat.applyTextToPreview.t: Clotho: Apply .clang-format Text to Preview (Dry Run)
config.pairingRules.title: File Extension Pairing Rules
config.pairingRules.description: Custom rules for pairing header and source file extensions. Each rule maps header extensions to source extensions.
config.headerGuard.title: Header Guard
config.headerGuard.description: Header guard configuration for C/C++ header files.
config.headerGuard.style.title: Header Guard Style
config.headerGuard.style.description: The style of header guard to use in new header files.
config.headerGuard.format.title: Header Guard Format
config.headerGuard.format.description: The format string for generating header guard names. Available placeholders: {FILE_NAME}, {FILE_NAME_UPPER}, {FILE_PATH}, {PROJECT_NAME}
config.clangFormat.title: Clang-Format
command.debug.dumpSwitchMetrics.title: Clotho: Dump Switch Performance Metrics
command.debug.selfTest.strategies.title: Clotho: Run Strategy Self-Tests
command.debug.clearAllCaches.title: Clotho: Clear All Caches
command.debug.dumpSwitchReport.title: Clotho: Dump Switch Performance Report
config.performance.slowOperationThreshol: Threshold in milliseconds beyond which operations are considered slow
config.fs.enableWatcher.description: Enable file system watchers for cache invalidation
config.fs.watchGlobs.description: Additional watch globs (RelativePattern) used by the file watcher; leave empty to use defaults
config.switch.cacheTTLms.description: TTL in ms for switch result cache entries (0 disables TTL)
config.logLevel.description: Minimum log level for Clotho logs
config.switch.ranking.sameDirBoost.descr: Ranking weight for candidates in the same directory
config.switch.ranking.workspaceRootBoost: Ranking weight for candidates in the same workspace folder
config.switch.ranking.extOrderBase.descr: Base bonus for preferred extensions based on target order
config.switch.ranking.depthBonusBase.des: Base bonus for path depth proximity
